stories.original_headline: A dying star’s final breath glows in a new Webb image of the Helix Nebula
stories.original_summary: Webb’s latest image of the Helix Nebula reveals a dramatic close-up of a dying star shedding its outer layers. The detailed view highlights glowing knots of gas shaped by fast-moving stellar winds colliding with older material. Changes in color trace a shift from scorching hot gas near the center to
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Sun's Last Light Seen Through Wizard's Scrying Glass
stories.fantasy_story: A great Wizard's enchanted scrying glass has captured the final, wondrous glow of an ancient, fading sun. This celestial beacon is slowly unfurling its last magical aura across the cosmic sky. The image shows shimmering motes of starlight, a breathtaking farewell from a star near its end.
